add_device.title: Add new EnOcean device

data.eep: Device type or EnOcean Equipment Profile (EEP)
data.name: Name

add_device.description: To add an EnOcean device you need at least its type and its ID. The EnOcean ID consists of four parts separated by colons and is usually printed on the device (e.g. '1E:F4:BA:C7').

select_device.title: Select EnOcean device for editing
select_device.description: Select the EnOcean device whose settings you want to change.

edit_device.title: Edit EnOcean device
edit_device.description: You can change the EnOcean device's model or EEP, its name or the EnOcean id which is used to send data to this device. Note that editing the model or EEP of the EnOcean device will also change the Home Assistant device and its entities.

delete_device.title: Delete EnOcean device
delete_device.description: Select an EnOcean device to delete. The corresponding Home Assistant device and all its entities will also be deleted.
